title: 98/641/EC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1998 amending Decision 93/452/EEC authorising the Member States to provide for derogations from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC, in respect of plants of Chamaecyparis Spach, Juniperus L. and Pinus L., respectively, originating in Japan (notified under document number C(1998) 3333)
